abstractText: We used an open capture, single-release, Cormack (1964), Jolly (1965), Seber (1965) (CJS) model to estimate survival and its variance from release of steelhead out-migrants to the PIT-array, from the PIT-array to the trap, from the trap to Bonneville Dam, and from Bonneville Dam to the Columbia River estuary.
title: Single Release Survival Estimation from Release of PIT-Tagged Smolt to Each Detection Point Downstream v1.0
